title: Dating, Mating & Roleplaying
itunes:title: Dating, Mating & Roleplaying
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Emily is taking calls to help you make 2019 the hottest year yet. She goes over some of the oddest dating stats of 2018 – from dealbreakers to masturbation injuries, ways to get into your role-play groove, and why taking a break...
description:
On today’s show, Emily is taking calls to help you make 2019 the hottest year yet.

She goes over some of the oddest dating stats of 2018 – from dealbreakers to masturbation injuries, ways to get into your role-play groove, and why taking a break from porn and masturbation can reignite your sex life with your partner. Plus, whether or not age makes a difference in your relationship.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: Womanizer, Just Fab, SiriusXM

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit: sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
